Hi {{guestName}},

Thank you for choosing us for {{serviceName}}. Share your thoughts here: {{feedbackUrl}}.
{{#if loyaltyOffer}}As a frequent guest you unlock {{loyaltyOffer}} for your next stay.{{/if}}

See you soon!
